Module com.example.dmscoursework
Package com.example.dmscoursework.Controller.fxml

Class MusicScreen

java.lang.Object
com.example.dmscoursework.Controller.fxml.MusicScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MusicScreen extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The MusicScreen class controls the musicScreen.fxml. This allows the user to make changes to the music being played. The user can select buttons to play music, pause music, reset music as well as change song to the next song or the previous song in the playlist. The user can also change the volume of the music that is playing.
Since:
04-01-2022
Version:
1.0
Author:
William Michiel Simson van Dijkhuizen
